p: Extensive integrated, automatic testing is provided in the fldgen v2.0 R package to both check that the software performs as intended and to explicitly validate that the statistical properties of interest for included example ESM data ( fldgen/inst/extdata) are indeed preserved in generated realizations. This explicit validation supplements mathematical proofs that the method being implemented in fldgen v2.0 has the described statistical preservation properties (further described and verified in Paper LS1).
